title: Linaro's Service Desk Webhook Framework Configuration Schema

handlers.description: Declares which request types map onto which handler

cf_cachefile.description: Location to use for cache of custom field IDs. Defaults to file stored in the repo

cf_use_server_api.description: Use Server REST API to retrieve custom fields

cf_use_cloud_api.description: Use Cloud REST API to retrieve custom fields

vault_iam_role.description: AWS IAM role to use when authenticating to Vault

vault_server_url.description: Where to reach the Vault server

bot_name.description: Account name to be used for all Service Desk operations

vault_bot_name.description: Path to retrieving the bot's password from Vault

ldap_base_dn.description: Base DN for LDAP server or leave blank if to be determined automatically

ldap_default_account_ou.description: Where to place new accounts. Base DN will be appended

ldap_security_groups.description: Where to find security groups. Base DN will be appended

ldap_mailing_groups.description: Where to find mailing groups. Base DN will be appended

ldap_user.description: DN of user to be used for LDAP operations

vault_ldap_name.description: Path to retrieving the LDAP user password from Vault

mail_host.description: Desired email relay host. Only define if sending email from handlers

mail_port.description: Define if a port other than 25 is needed

mail_ssl.description: Define if SSL is required for the email connection

mail_user.description: Sending username. Only define if authentication is required

vault_mail_name.description: Path to retrieving the mail user's password from Vault

final_entry.description: Marker to allow previous entries to be commented out safely
